item.description: I had just posted several meetups on my other website...alot in Massachusetts as well. Please join my other meetup as I would be sitting at the computer all day if i posted here as well. Also,,please let me know what town/city you live in, so I can try to find places near you as well. Here is the website of all the posting... Have a good day! Lynsie http://www.meetup.com/Maine-NH-Mass/

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Hello Ladies ! ((THIS IS NOT A MEETUP)) JUST AN ANNOUCEMENT !
